xtc.parser
Class TextTester

java.lang.Object
  xtc.tree.Visitor
      xtc.parser.TextTester

public class TextTester
extends Visitor

Visitor to identify text-only productions. A production is text-only if it does not define a semantic value beyond declaring a string value and references only other text-only productions (if any). Notably, a text-only production may not contain parser actions, semantic actions that reference CodeGenerator.VALUE, or bindings to CodeGenerator.VALUE. Note that this visitor only detects such productions but does not add appropriate value elements.

Version:
$Revision: 1.42 $
